00171     double mean    ( ) const            { return pMean;             }

00270     // If set to "true", the second normally distributed
00271     // random number, generated one step before, was
00272     // stored in "gset" and can be returned at once. Otherwise,
00273     // two new random numbers must be generated.
00274     bool   iset;
00275 
00276     // The second generated normally distributed random number
00277     // is stored here, when "iset" is set to "true".
